programme.title: Bluey

programme.title: Piripenguins

programme.title: Waffle's After School Club

programme.desc: (2019) M. Night Shyamalan directs an all-star cast in this genre-bending superhero sequel. Three superhumans team up to escape a psychiatric ward. With Bruce Willis in a cagoule.

programme.title: Benjamin
programme.desc: (2018) Simon Amstell's bittersweet comedy romance stars Colin Morgan as a young filmmaker angsting over his second feature when he falls for a French music student.

programme.title: The Winslow Boy
programme.desc: (1948) Anthony Asquith's drama based on a famous 1912 court case with Cedric Hardwicke as the father of a boy accused of theft who pursues the case to the highest courts. With Robert Donat.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: (1962) Historical drama with Ralph Richardson. A retelling of the stand made at Thermopylae in 480 BC by a small Greek force against invasion by an enormous Persian army.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Jowett Javelin/Ford Escort: Derek dives into the lost Jowett marque, as a 1952 Javelin finds an unexpected home. Paul and Dave find a Ford Escort that's been untouched for 30 years.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Bond Bug/Jag MK2: A 1970s Bond Bug three-wheeler divides opinion among Mathewsons customers, while a retired engineer reluctantly auctions off his father's treasured 60s Jaguar Mark 2.

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: Hitler's Birthday: At the end of March 1945, with Germany's Army depleted and Hitler's circle of trust shrinking, he invites a group of Hitler Youth to the Reich Chancellery.

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: L39 Jet: At St Athan in Wales, engineer John Sparks and his team of ex-Navy and RAF engineers begin the task of reassembling the Czech-built jet from nine parts delivered by lorry.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Durham Cathedral 2: Fiona Bruce presents from Durham Cathedral, where finds include a carriage clock, an early drawing by Laura Knight, and a 19th-century missionary's medical kit.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Kalahari: Simon Reeve travels across the Kalahari desert in southern Africa, going on a hunt with a group of San trackers before heading to the oasis of the Okavango Delta.

programme.title: Train Truckers
programme.desc: GWR Steam Locomotive: In Shropshire a Great Western Railway 'Modified Hall' steam engine and its tender is being taken out of service as it needs a safety inspection.

programme.title: New: Train Rescue Down Under
programme.desc: One Day Mission: A freight train needs an urgent engine replacement after a critical failure, and a crew works on a complex bogie change for a 132 T locomotive.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Mini Cooper S/Chevy Pickup: Behind the scenes of a North Yorkshire-based, family-run historic car auction business. Featured vehicles include a Mini Cooper and Chevrolet Pick-up.
